name: SME Accounting – One Stop Business & Accounting Solution For SMEs From Anywhere Around The World
author: SMEVai

sections.description:
SME Accounting – ONE STOP BUSINESS & ACCOUNTING SOLUTION FOR SMEs FROM ANYWHERE AROUND THE WORLD.

Take your bookkeeping skills to the next level for your eCommerce or F-Commerce businesses using the ultimate accounting solution, SME Accounting.

üéØ Track Sales, Purchases & Payments All From One Platform

With the help of this outstanding new accounting solution you can calculate existing product stock, maintain cash books, create detailed income statements, match balance sheets based on all income and expenditure straight from one single platform.

And not just that, you can also entry and keep track of all rents, asset values, & salaries – basically any and all type of expenditure that you need to make

üî• Generate Digital Invoices Instantly For All Purchases

SME Hishab also helps you generate digital invoices for all purchases and sales by all Trading businesses. You can also email the invoices to customers or suppliers, at any time, directly from within the plugin.

Even if you add this accounting plugin to an already popular WooCommerce website, no need to worry about missing out on previous sale entries – all will be synced automatically & updated immediately.

üé® Get Access To 6 Stunning, Ready Invoice Templates

For all of these invoices, you can get your hands on 6 completely ready, stunning and fully customizable templates. You can modify and personalize them all just the way you want with ease!

üîó Seamlessly Integrate With Woocommerce & Other CRMs

You do not need to worry about WooCommerce not having its own analytical features and options. But SME Hishab can auto sync with your rising WooCommerce website and generate all necessary invoices with just a single click of an API integration.

üìä Easily Monitor Real-Time Reports & Balance Sheets

Once your SME Hishab plugin is seamlessly connected with WooCommerce, you can effortlessly create real-time reports, balance sheets, income statements, purchase invoices and track them all in an instant.

üèÜ Manage Receivables & Payments For Your Company

And of course, keep track and monitor your all receivables and payables so that you never miss a single payment with the help of the best accounting plugin for WordPress – SME Hishab.

üöÄ BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This accounting plugin is brought to you by the team behind SMEVai, a dedicated platform to provide the best accounting, training and legal services to business entrepreneurs from around the world.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.
  2. Search For “SME Accounting”.
  3. Install, then Activate it.
  4. Follow the Documentation

Old Way:

  1. Upload sme-accounting to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
